title: Gender reveal hilariously backfires in every way possible
text:
This couple’s gender reveal began with an destructible balloon and ended with the soon-to-be father falling from the top of a fence (Picture: Instagram Brent Murray)

This couple’s gender reveal party went wrong in seemingly every way possible.

Video posted to Instagram by user Brent Murray shows a man and woman using sticks to whack a big black balloon, which presumably contained confetti or another blue or pink substance to indicate their unborn child’s gender.

The couple swats at the balloon that appears to be tied to the ground, but it refuses to pop no matter how hard they try.

In the background, someone can be heard shouting: ‘Yeah, hit it! Hit it hard…Oh man, strike out.’

The soon-to-be father musters up his best swing and gives the balloon a hard smack, but it still doesn’t burst. Instead it becomes untethered and begins floating away without revealing its contents.

As the balloon makes it’s great escape, the man initially does not notice. By the time he realizes, it’s already too late.

In a last ditch effort, the man sprints after the balloon as it floats out of the fenced-in yard.

Woman shot by Labrador puppy as she sat in a car

Desperately, he tries to hop the fence – but it appears as though he is just as good at jumping fences as he is popping balloons.

He gets stuck halfway over the fence before flopping down onto the ground.

As his family and friends watch the balloon sail away, the man remains on the ground with his hands behind his head, wallowing in defeat.

The footage has been viewed over 1.5 million times by users who apparently enjoyed the couple’s hilariously bad attempt to reveal their baby’s gender. (Picture: Twitter)

The video ends and it is unclear if they ever revealed the gender of their baby.

Barstool Sports originally posted the footage, which has been viewed over 1.5 million times.
description: A couple's gender reveal began with an destructible balloon and ended with the soon-to-be father falling from the top of a fence
